pages.text: Now that you are probably buried underground for safety with some torches and a campfire. Let's take some time to understand more about the mobs and why they are so dangerous. One of the reasons to read this is to help you be quiet as you can probably guess why.

Yes, mobs can hear you. And if they do, zombies will tunnel to you with pickaxes while creepers will blast away at anything you call a wall. Skeletons have aimbot, spiders move like real life and are way faster. There are also many more variations of mobs of all sorts that are also eager to kill you and none of them burn at daytime. Oh, they also spawn in bigger groups and more frequently.

On top of all that, lays the theme for this modpack - 'Mobsieges'. These events happen every once in a while where you are out in the open, so be careful. Mobs spawn in groups of their respective species (slimes, blazes, creepers, etc) in amounts of up to 25 individual mobs. A mobsiege is very dangerous, especially because fire and tnt is used frequently. So if you die, your items probably will too. So just run away!
